subject: Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
Basketball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The 1999 N.B.A. labor deal imposed salary caps and a luxury tax, but team owners say those controls no longer deter profligate spending, and so they are seeking new limits.
snippet: The 1999 N.B.A. labor deal imposed salary caps and a luxury tax, but team owners say those controls no longer deter profligate spending, and so they are seeking new limits.
